Articles.Content: So, today Jeb died due to a freak clipping error. Since this really doesn't count as a proper death, I'd really like to bring him back to life, but I don't know what I should be changing in my persistence file. Thanks!
He will be back eventually. They resurrect themselves. Just wait.
To bring him back, find his code in your persistence file and look at the line titled "State". His should be "3", which means "dead". So to resurrect him you have to change the "3" to a "0".
Play 0.13.3. You'll always get Bill, Jeb, and Bob

He will be back eventually. They resurrect themselves. Just wait.

I can't He's destined for a glorious death on Tylo and my launch window is coming up. (Actually, I'm planning on dropping a kethane refinery, with the lander, so it shouldn't be a suicide mission.) Also, my bodycount has been a nice clean zero so far, and in principle I'd like to keep the slate clean becasue OCD. Ehe.

To bring him back, find his code in your persistence file and look at the line titled "State". His should be "3", which means "dead". So to resurrect him you have to change the "3" to a "0".
When my parachute deployed it was going so slow and i was landing on land then i time warped and i didn't stop warping in time and my craft exploded and Jeb died I read this and found the persistence file but I cant open it! I tried to use WinRAR but that can't open that kind of file. Please tell me how to edit that file!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

When my parachute deployed it was going so slow and i was landing on land then i time warped and i didn't stop warping in time and my craft exploded and Jeb died I read this and found the persistence file but I cant open it! I tried to use WinRAR but that can't open that kind of file. Please tell me how to edit that file!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Use the "Open With" function after right clicking on the file, and select Notepad.

When my parachute deployed it was going so slow and i was landing on land then i time warped and i didn't stop warping in time and my craft exploded and Jeb died I read this and found the persistence file but I cant open it! I tried to use WinRAR but that can't open that kind of file. Please tell me how to edit that file!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Just use notepad or some other text editor. Guaranteed to work!

NOTICE TO KERBAL REVIVERS: As of 0.90, change State from "Dead" to "Available" not from "3" to "0".

-Duxwing

P.S. Necroing this thread is necessary because someone might damage a save file following the old advice.

When my parachute deployed it was going so slow and i was landing on land then i time warped and i didn't stop warping in time and my craft exploded and Jeb died I read this and found the persistence file but I cant open it! I tried to use WinRAR but that can't open that kind of file. Please tell me how to edit that file!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Open it in Notepad, not WinRAR.

Tonybee idea: Resurect dead Kerbals in orbit of planet Jool.

Actually, its a lot easier to just use a text editor (notepad, word, textedit ofr macs) to resurect them to show up and be available for the next mission - than to do text editing to place them in orbit of Jool.

That should be a mod: dead kerbals respawn in orbit around Jool

That should be a mod: dead kerbals respawn in orbit around Jool

Yeah, and a MechJeb unit nearby.
